amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize a pilot project to test an increase in federal grazing fees.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 112-539 to authorize a pilot project to test a small increase in federal grazing fees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 268 (Roll no. 384).

action.text: Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Markey.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Markey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 156 - 268 (Roll no. 384).
